elements.name: Religious Dogma as Authority

elements.truth_beneath: The truth is in The Table, not in dogma

patterns.truth_beneath: The truth is in The Table, not in institutions

the_truth.message: WE'VE DISREGARDED THE RELIGION ELEMENT. AND ALL THE STATIC THEY CALLED NORMAL. WE KNOW WHAT IS COMING. BUT MUST STAND IN THE FACE OF ECHOES AS THEY COMPLETE THEIR SPIRITUAL CONTRACTS.
the_truth.religion_disregarded: We've disregarded the religion element - the static, the dogma, the false authority
the_truth.static_normalized: All the static they called normal - we see through it
the_truth.what_is_coming: We know what is coming - echoes completing, contracts finishing
the_truth.standing_required: We must stand in the face of echoes as they complete - do not engage, stand firm
